description:
Non material amendment of planning permission ref P112819, dated 28 March 2012 for the erection of a 31-storey tower plus basement (max. 116.620 above OS datum) to provide 190 residential units comprising of 19 x studios, 73 x 1-bedroom, 80 x 2-bedroom, 18 x 3-bedroom units and 1019 sqm of flexible A1/A2/A3/A4/A5/B1 commercial floorspace, together with landscaping and public realm improvements and four number car parking spaces (total of 80 car parking spaces at basement level). The amendments are: 
A] Internal reconfiguration of the proposed tower building including basement, ground and mezzanine levels and all floors of residential accommodation including the alteration of one studio flat to one additional two-bedroom flat (at level 19), thereby increasing the total number of habitable rooms from 477hr to 479hr (proposed accommodation mix would be 18 x studios, 73 x 1-bedroom, 81 x 2-bedroom, 18 x 3-bedroom units) 
B] Increase to the height of the lift overrun by 1300mm (from FFL +116.620 to FFL +117.920)
decision_conditions:
The applicant is reminded that the scope of the proposed alterations agreed under this non material amendment application are strictly as described in the covering letter (ref: J6034), prepared by Gerald Eve dated 02/05/2012 and as summarised below:
A] Internal reconfiguration of the proposed tower building including basement, ground and mezzanine levels and all floors of residential accommodation including the alteration of one studio flat to one additional two-bedroom flat (at level 19), thereby increasing the total number of habitable rooms from 477 to 479 (proposed accommodation mix would be 18 x studios, 73 x 1-bedroom, 81 x 2-bedroom, 18 x 3-bedroom units = total 190 units) 
B] Increase to the height of the lift overrun by 1300mm (from FFL +116.620 to FFL +117.920)
